whyStokily.title: Why Stokily?
whyStokily.description: Stokily is the complete business management solution that combines inventory control, point-of-sale, e-commerce, and analytics in one powerful platform. Whether you run a retail store, pharmacy, restaurant, or online shop, Stokily gives you everything you need to manage your business efficiently—even when you're offline.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to run your business efficiently

stockManagement.title: Stock Management
stockManagement.description: Complete inventory control at your fingertips. Track stock levels in real-time, get low stock alerts, support product variants, and view complete stock history.

pos.title: Point of Sale (POS)
pos.description: Lightning-fast checkout that keeps customers happy. Barcode scanning makes checkout 10x faster than manual entry.

invoicing.title: Professional Invoicing
invoicing.description: Create and manage invoices like a pro. Generate professional invoices with company branding and export to PDF.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Website Builder
ecommerce.description: Create your online store in minutes—no coding required. Transform your inventory into a beautiful online store.

customers.title: Customer Management
customers.description: Build lasting customer relationships. Track purchase history, view customer statistics, and identify your best customers.

analytics.title: Business Analytics
analytics.description: Make data-driven decisions with powerful insights. Track revenue, sales performance, inventory health, and product performance.

technical.title: Powerful Technical Features
technical.subtitle: Enterprise-grade features that make Stokily special

offline.title: Works Completely Offline
offline.description: Never lose a sale due to internet issues. Full functionality without internet connection. All features work offline with automatic sync when connection is restored.
offline.why: Why it matters: Internet can be unreliable. With Stokily, your business never stops.

barcode.title: Professional Barcode Scanning
barcode.description: Industry-standard barcode system. Scan products instantly with your phone camera. Supports all major formats: EAN, UPC, QR codes. Quick scan makes checkout 10x faster.
barcode.why: Why it matters: Speed up checkout, reduce errors, compete with big retailers.

printing.title: Thermal Receipt Printing
printing.description: Professional receipts for your customers. Bluetooth, USB, and network printer support. Automatic receipt generation with company branding.
printing.why: Why it matters: Professional image, customer satisfaction, legal compliance.

multilang.title: Multi-Language Support
multilang.description: Speak your customers' language. English, French, and Arabic with right-to-left (RTL) support. Easy language switching with localized date and time formats.
multilang.why: Why it matters: Serve diverse customers, expand to new markets.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Stokily Privacy Policy - Learn how we collect, use, and protect your data.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: Welcome to Stokily. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and services.
introduction.paragraph2: By using Stokily, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our application.

accountInfo.title: 2.1 Account Information
accountInfo.content: When you create an account, we collect your email address, password (encrypted), full name, and phone number for authentication and account management.

businessData.title: 2.2 Business Data
businessData.content: We collect your company information, product catalog, inventory data, sales transactions, customer and supplier information, financial records (expenses and contributions), and employee data to provide our inventory and POS management services.

deviceInfo.title: 2.3 Device Information
deviceInfo.content: We automatically collect device information, app usage data, network information, and crash reports to improve app stability and performance.

items.name: Camera
items.description: To scan barcodes for quick product entry and POS checkout.

items.name: Photo Library
items.description: To upload product images, company logos, and attach receipts/documents.

items.name: Location
items.description: To discover Bluetooth printers in your vicinity.

items.name: Bluetooth
items.description: To connect to thermal printers for receipt printing.

items.name: Storage
items.description: To save PDF invoices, reports, and export data.

howWeUse.title: 4. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, manage your account, sync data across devices, process transactions, generate reports, communicate with you, and ensure security. We do not sell your personal information.

dataStorage.title: 5. Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.content: Your data is stored securely using Firebase (Google) for cloud storage and authentication. We implement encryption, secure authentication, and access controls. Data is retained while your account is active and can be deleted at any time.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, update, correct, and delete your data. You can export your data, control app permissions through device settings, and delete your account at any time.

thirdParty.title: 7. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use Firebase (Google) for authentication, database, and storage; Cloudinary for image processing; and thermal printers for receipt printing. These services have their own privacy policies.

contactUs.title: 8. Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

privacy.consent: By using Stokily, you consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
